Notes: [1] A Competent Committee of Home-makers and Physicians, ed. Home and Health; a Household Manual Containing Two Thousand Recipes and Helpful Suggestions on the Building and Care of the Home in Harmony with Sanitory Laws. Internet Archive. Mountain View, CA, Portland, OR.: Pacific Press Publishing Co., 1907. https://archive.org/details/homehealthhouseh00moun/page/140/mode/2up. Click Americana. https://clickamericana.com/topics/home-garden/how-to-use-washboards-wringers-old-fashioned-laundry-equipment. [4] Home Washing Machine & Wringer. 1869. Lithograph Print. Library of Congress. Washington, D.C. Library of Congress. https://www.loc.gov/resource/pga.03845/. [2 (second appearance)] Bailey Wringing Machine Co. c. 1870-1900. Miami University Libraries - Digital Collections. https://www.flickr.com/photos/muohio_digital_collections/2921844987/. [5] Bushnell, Joseph P. What to Do and How to Do It; a Home Manual, Treating of the Home and Its Interests, the Culinary Art, Health and Its Requirements, the Farm and Its Activities, Things Worth Remembering, Miscellaneous Information, Etc., Etc., Etc. Internet Archive. Chicago, Ill.: Home manual publishing co., 1909. https://archive.org/details/whattodohowtodoi00bush/page/58/mode/2up.

entry.title: The Entire Process of Writing My Book | Nonfiction Writing Vlog

media:group.media:title: The Entire Process of Writing My Book | Nonfiction Writing Vlog
media:group.media:description:
The first 1000 people to sign up with my link will get a one month trial of Skillshare! https://skl.sh/bernadettebanner02221 "Make, Sew and Mend" is now available for pre-order through most large book retailers, and will be released officially on the 17th May, 2022. Visit https://linktr.ee/makesewandmend to find a copy for yourself, or pop into your local indie bookshop to enquire after a copy. NON-US ORDERS: International distribution and translation is dependent on a country-to-country basis. Large book retailers such as Amazon.com and Book Depository should be able to ship to most places in the world, but information on national publication will be forthcoming after official publication. GERMAN EDITION: https://www.topp-kreativ.de/die-kunst-des-naehens-27005
If you'd like to check out the glorious contributing writers, they can be found on YouTube and Instagram: @Dandy Wellington : https://www.instagram.com/dandywellington/ @Be Queer, Make Stuff : https://www.instagram.com/bequeermakestuff/ @Retro Claude : https://www.instagram.com/retroclaude/ @Cheon-Shik Yang Ï≤úÏãù Ïñë : https://www.instagram.com/yang_cheon_shik/ Sophia Khan: https://www.instagram.com/sophia___khan/

Epidemicsound.com "Painting the World", Raymond Grouse. Epidemicsound.com "Toss Me the Tomatoes", Raymond Grouse. Epidemicsound.com "Miika's Journey", Lama House. media:group.media:description:

Check out @Hazariel Costumes 's video (and subscribe!): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SXk1H5d_pQk
The full version of "Gheuth ni Manetheren (Weep for Manetheren)" can be found on @Hildegard von Blingin' 's channel (also subscribe if you haven't!): https://youtu.be/o3ZKH4kLNmA
Lyrics: Conden iro sa muadniey a fel daden Veshan daine dyu ir mamen Al'dhol daes dalae vid daishar Laada culieb, laada culieb
Denanen al'Manetheren Ghueth ni al'shar al'Aemon Soutak ni Manetheren Laada culieb, laada culieb
Sa dhol sorbe ko'shar Gaen al'Tarendrelle Rafane al Caldazar Ti lendha maral
Inde dhol nolvae No disain isharane Dyu rahien al'tarmon'nag Shar sain duadhe, shar sain duadhe
Denanen al'Manetheren Ghueth ni al'shar al'Aemon Soutak ni Manetheren Laada culieb, laada culieb ----- English: We walk the footsteps of our fathers The trails blazed by our mothers They bought the land with their blood Long ago, long ago
Sing of Manetheren Weep for the blood of Aemon Cry for Manetheren Long ago, long ago
In the land where the first blood runs Across the Tarendrelle Flew the Red Eagle Destined to fall
No ground was given But they were betrayed By dawn on the last day The waters were blood
Sing of Manetheren Weep for the blood of Aemon Cry for Manetheren Long ago, long ago -----
[1] "Bringing the Wheel of Time Costumes to Life: Part 1 | Prime Video" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BVpWkeEuUgE
